title: Champion Idea " Zeiren, The Blade Trickster"
body:
Name: Zeiren, The Blade Trickster
Appearance: Zeiren is an Acrobatics, in Frejlord. Who likes blade. His blades looks kinda like a smaller version of Nocturne's blade. (Inspiration: Talon{{champion:91}}, Gnar{{champion:150}}, Shaco{{champion:35}})
Intended Role:Assassin, Fighter
Lore: N/A
>Health: 576.12 (+80 per level)
>Mana: 250 (+30 per level)
>Attack Damage: 52.665 (+3.8 per level)
>Attack Speed: 0.697 (+3.5% per level)
>Movement Speed: 320
>Health Regen: 5.31 (+1 per level)
>Mana Regen: 4 (+0.8 per level)
>Armor: 24.65 (+2.5 per level)
>Magic Resist: 34.2 (+1.10 per level)
  
**Abilities:**
Passive - Hidden Blades
If Zeiren is attacked by an enemy champion, his next AA will deal extra damage based on 3.5% of their maximum health. (This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.)

Q - Trick Blade
Zeiren throw a blade at an enemy dealing 54/58/62/66/70(+ 10% of Base AD) damage, if he reactivate this ablity mid air the blade will split into a cone shape dealing 44/48/52/56/60 magic damage(+ 10%bonus AP) of .
Cost: 65/60/55/50/45 Mana
Range: 950

W - Flying Blade
Zeiren  throws a blade that deal 10/15/20/25/30 damage and slows enemies by 60% decaying over the next 3 seconds it hits before returning to him. If he catches the blade it can be cast two times, but in the second cast if you catch it it will increase the Cooldown by 2%.
Cost: 80/70/60/50/40 Mana
Range: 800

E - Tricked!
Passively: Increase Zeiren attack speed by 15%.
Active: Zeiren becomes invisible for 20 seconds, but have reduced movement speed. If you activate E while there is a flying blade from any of your abilities you will teleport{{summoner:12}}  to the location of that blade.
Cost: No Cost
Movement speed debuff: 10%

R - Acrobatics
Zeiren jumps 5 times dealing 70/80/90/100/110 area of effect damage, if he activates this ability while invisible from E he can control the direction of the landing.
Cost: 100/120/140 Mana
Range: 1000

Comment about the champion

replies.body: 50% reduced movement... thats at 400 hes movespeed decreses to 200? sounds rather slow and useless.
20 second invisibility seems like a broken ability. You could virtually run to their nexus undetected given you had all turrets down.
That why i decrease his movespeed, so 20 second invis with 50% reduced movement.
